business.headline: Elon Musk gets even richer after wealth hits all-time high post Trump winThe jump in Elon Musk's fortune came after Tesla shares rose 3.8% on Friday, reaching a 3.5-year closing high of $352.56 per share.

Jeff Bezos denies Musk's claim on Tesla stock advice: '100% not true'Elon Musk said on social media platform X that Bezos had advised people to sell their Tesla and SpaceX shares, predicting Donald Trump's electoral defeat.

Byju's founder told US ally to flee the US to avoid testifying: ReportThe businessman, William R. Hailer, testified before US Bankruptcy Judge John T. Dorsey, alleging that Byju Raveendran offered him a lucrative job and sent him a $10,700 plane ticket to Dubai just two days before he was scheduled to testify.

Sensex ends nearly 2,000 points higher, Nifty above 23,900A broad-based recovery in information technology (IT), financial, banking and energy stocks spearheaded the recovery. A sharp rebound in Adani Group stocks also added to the positive momentum.
Sensex surges 2,000 points, Rs 7 lakh crore added: 4 key factors behind rallyThe Sensex was up 2039.44 points to 79,195.23 at 2:57 pm, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 587.90  to 23,938.75.

Bitcoin hits record high, within touching distance of $100,000 milestoneThe world's leading cryptocurrency topped $99,300, coming within striking distance of the psychological milestone that many experts had anticipated after the US election results.

Sensex jumps 1,200 points: 3 things to know about today's stock market bull runThe BSE Sensex climbed 1,193.90 points to cross 78,340.07, while the NSE Nifty advanced 371.50 points to reach 23,721.40.

Sensex jumps over 1,000 points as most Adani Group stocks rebound sharplyStock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex climbed 1,034.76 points to 78,190.55 by 12:42 pm, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 329.15 points to reach 23,679.05.

Adani Group accused of racial discrimination at Australian coal mining unitAdani Bribery Case: The Nagana Yarrbayn Wangan & Jagalingou Cultural Custodians in Queensland state filed a complaint alleging serious racial discrimination by Bravus Mining and Resources, an Adani Group unit.

Adani bribery case: S&P lowers outlook on 3 Adani units, raises funding concernsGautam Adani Case: S&P expressed concerns that the accusations could erode investor confidence, impair funding access, and escalate borrowing costs for the group.

Zinka Logistics makes tepid market debut: Should investors hold or exit?Zinka Logistics listing: Shares listed at Rs 280.90 on the National Stock Exchange (NSE), a 2.89% premium to the issue price of Rs 273. On the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), the stock opened at Rs 279.05, reflecting a 2.22% premium.

Ola Electric layoffs: 500 employees likely to lose jobs amid restructuringOla Electric Layoffs News: The move aims to streamline operations, eliminate redundant roles, and enhance profitability. The restructuring process, which began months ago, is expected to conclude by December 2024.

Gold, silver price today, November 22, 2024: Precious metals record hike on MCXGold Price Today: Both gold and silver are trading on the higher side of the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) on Friday. Check the latest city-wise prices here.

Adani Group stocks extend slide amid bribery charges. Details hereAdani Group stocks: This marks the second consecutive session of heavy losses for the conglomerate, with Thursday's rout wiping out Rs 2.25 lakh crore from the group's market capitalisation.

How Sagar Adani's 'bribe notes' unravelled $250 million schemeAdani Bribery Case: At the heart of the complex bribery scheme for which Gautam Adani and his associates have been indicted are the industrialist's nephew Sagar Adani and the detailed "bribe notes" he kept on his mobile phone.

Paytm shares jump 3% today after brokerage Bernstein's update. Should you buy?Paytm share price: With shares up 34% this year and 136% in six months, Paytm's growth potential continues to attract investor interest, although challenges remain.
Sensex, Nifty bounce back; Adani Energy shares down 5%Stock Market Today: The S&P BSE Sensex was up 496.10 points to 77,651.89, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 72.25 points to 23,422.15

Adani Enterprises, Adani Green, Airtel, LTI, JSW, Zinka: Stocks to watch todayBroader market indices also faced selling pressure, with volatility surging across sectors. As trading opens today, several stocks are expected to remain in focus due to recent developments.
Kenya cancels $700 million deal with Adani Group after US chargesKenya has terminated a $700 million agreement with the Adani Group following a US indictment.

Kenya cancels $730 million proposed deals with Adani Group after US indictmentKenyan President William Ruto has ordered the cancellation of several proposed deals with the Adani Group after the US indicted industrialist Gautam Adani in a bribery case.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Decoding Mahayuti's winning formula in Maharashtra after Lok Sabha heartbreakThe BJP-led Mahayuti's campaign during the Maharashtra elections combined political alliances, social outreach, organisational infrastructure and issue-based focus to ensure the alliance's grand success.

Clashes in UP's Sambhal over mosque survey, stones thrown, tear gas firedA complaint, filed by Supreme Court lawyer Vishnu Shankar Jain, claimed that Mughal emperor Babar demolished a temple, Hari Har Mandir, which once stood at the site of the Shahi Masjid.

Trudeau calls officials 'criminals' over fake intel of Modi link in Nijjar plotCanadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau criticised his own national security officials, accusing them of leaking classified information to the media and misrepresenting the facts after reports emerged linking PM Modi to the alleged plot to murder Hardeep Singh Nijjar.

1st Test Day 3 LIVE: Kohli joins Jaiswal after Hazlewood removes PadikkalAUS vs IND, 1st Test Day 3 Live Updates and Reactions: Josh Hazlewood has struck on his first ball after Lunch. Devdutt Padikkal walks back and Virat Kohli comes out to join Yashasvi Jaiswal. India have gone past a lead of 300 runs and are looking to set a winning total.
How dating life has become the new 'reality show' on InstagramA recent study by Bumble shows that dating has become the 'new favourite reality show' on social media.

India counted 640 million votes in 1 day: Elon Musk on delayed California resultElon Musk On California Result: Elon Musk criticised California's delayed presidential election results, comparing them to India's efficient vote counting during the Lok Sabha elections. Kamala Harris was declared winner by US agencies in California, with an official announcement pending.

Hindu BJP candidate trounces 11 Muslims in UP. What led to his massive win?BJP candidate Ramveer Thakur secured a decisive victory in Kundarki, defeating 11 Muslim contenders, including Samajwadi Party's Haji Rizwan, by a margin of over 1 lakh votes.

'Ek hain toh safe hain' now India's chant: PM's dig after NDA's Maharashtra winPM Modi speech on Maharashtra election results: Upping the ante against Congress, PM Modi said that the 'ek hain toh safe hain" slogan has now become the country's 'maha-mantra' (chant).

Video: Trudeau grooved at Taylor Swift concert while Montreal burnedCanadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has found himself at the centre of a social media storm after a viral video showed him dancing and singing along to music at a Taylor Swift concert in Toronto while anti-NATO protests erupted in Montreal.

Yoda Diagnostics Launches 'Beat the Diabetes' Campaign to Raise Awareness and Promote Personalized Diabetes CareEmpowering Personalized Diabetes Care: Yoda Diagnostics' 'Beat the Diabetes' Campaign Promotes Genetic-Based Medication Plans

Shooting near Israeli Embassy in Jordan, gunman killed, 3 cops injuredThe gunman, who began shooting at a police patrol in the Rabiah neighbourhood of Amman, was shot dead by police in the wake of the public security.

People, not peers, turn work of art into literature: President at Sahitya Aaj TakPresident Droupadi Murmu praised litterateurs for their contribution to literature and art and said she would host them at the Rashtrapati Bhavan soon.

Watch: Yashasvi Jaiswal plays audacious uppercut to bring up Perth Test hundredYashasvi Jaiswal hit an audacious uppercut to bring up his maiden hundred in Australia. Jaiswal completed his century in 205 balls on Day 3 of the opening Test match in Perth.

AR Rahman issues warning over 'defamatory posts' about separation with Saira BanuIn an open legal warning issued to "all slanderers", singer AR Rahman gave a 24-hour window to delete the objectionable content targeting him and his family after the news of his separation with Saira Banu.

How Maharashtra results will shape tomorrow's national politics | Six big pointsThe Maharashtra Assembly election results will have repercussions way beyond the state. From Hindutva politics to reforms push, to alliance arithmetic, the outcome will determine the course and discourse of national politics.

Aadar Jain-Alekha's roka: Ranbir Kapoor, Kareena-Karisma, family attendKareena Kapoor's cousin and Rima Jain's son, Aadar Jain and his fiance, Alekha Advani's roka ceremony took place on November 23. Their family members and close friends attended it.

In Nanded, Congress wins Lok Sabha constituency but loses all Assembly seatsThe Congress on Saturday managed to win the Nanded Lok Sabha seat in Maharashtra. the party, however, lost all the Assembly seats to BJP and Eknath Shinde's Shiv Sena.

Hemant Soren is Jharkhand's choice for 2nd straight term. What worked for him?The INDIA bloc, led by the Jharkhand Mukti Morcha, won 56 out of the 81 Assembly seats as per the elections results announced by the Election Commission on Saturday.

Martin Makary, who opposed Covid vaccine mandate, is Trump's pick to lead FDAMartin Makary was known for his contrarian stance during the Covid pandemic, as he questioned the necessity of masking. He was not opposed to the vaccine but questioned making it mandatory for the public.

Watch: Taj Mahal emerges in winter fog like a scene out of movie, looks etherealThe Taj Mahal, shrouded in a veil of fog, appears ethereal, its white marble shimmering softly against the muted morning light.

Amid row over Navjot Sidhu's remarks on wife's cancer cure, top doctors' appealOncologists at Tata Memorial Hospital asserted that there was no evidence to support Navjot Sidhu's remarks that his wife overcame cancer following a strict dietary regimen.

Bengal Governor unveils own statue at Raj Bhavan, faces political backlashThe Governor's office said that the statue was a gift and not initiated by Ananda Bose himself. Political parties accused him of self-glorification and branding the act as shameful and egotistical.

Wall Street veteran Scott Bessent tapped as Trump's treasury secretaryScott Bessent is a billionaire hedge fund manager and an advocate for deficit reduction. He had worked for macro investment billionaire George Soros and noted short seller Jim Chanos.

Viral pic: Rashmika Mandanna's lunch date with Vijay DeverakondaRashmika Mandanna and Vijay Deverakonda, known for sparking dating rumours, were recently seen enjoying a lunch date. Their candid photo from the lunch is going viral.

sports.headline: In-form KL Rahul has to bat in top 3 in Pink Ball Test: Sanjay ManjrekarFormer cricketer Sanjay Manjrekar feels that in-form KL Rahul should bat at in the top three positions in the opening Test match. Manjrekar has said that even India captain Rohit Sharma could drop down to the middle order in the pink ball Test.

KL Rahul-Jaiswal 1st Indian opening pair to stitch 200-plus stand in AustraliaBorder-Gavaskar Trophy: KL Rahul and Yashasvi Jaiswal scripted history on Day 3 of the first Border-Gavaskar Trophy Test in Perth, recording a 201-run opening partnership—the highest for India in Australia.

Hardik completed the historic double during Baroda's five-wicket victory against Gujarat.

Be patient: Harshit Rana reveals Gautam Gambhir advice before Perth debutIndian pacer Harshit Rana has credited coach Gautam Gambhir for making a good start to his Test career and thanked him for the kind of support that he has shown towards the youngster. Harshit revealed the advice he got from the India coach as he was waiting in the wings for his chance.

IPL 2025 Mega Auction LIVE in India: When and where to watchThe IPL 2025 mega auction will take place in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia on November 24 and 25. 204 spots are needed to be filled by 10 franchises while 577 players (210 overseas and 367 Indians) will be auctioned.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
